data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Harry's apartment is on 3rd street. He ____ in a building ____ has 5 floors, and ____ lives ____ the 3rd floor. To ____ to ____ apartment ____ can ____ either ____ elevator ____ the ____. His apartment faces east, so he sees the sun in the morning.
data.partBlankContent: Harry's apartment is on 3rd street. He li___ in a building th__ has 5 floors, and h_ lives o_ the 3rd floor. To g__ to h__ apartment y__ can ta__ either t__ elevator o_ the sta___. His apartment faces east, so he sees the sun in the morning.
data.fullContent: Harry's apartment is on 3rd street. He lives in a building that has 5 floors, and he lives on the 3rd floor. To get to his apartment you can take either the elevator or the stairs. His apartment faces east, so he sees the sun in the morning.
data.answer: 哈里的公寓在第三街。他住在一栋五层的大楼里，他住在三楼。要去他的公寓，你可以乘电梯或走楼梯。他的公寓朝东，所以他早上能看到太阳。
